mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_BDI_CIS_ABI( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, CREDITCARD_NO, CREDITCARD_NAME, UNIT, CREDITCARD_TYPE, CREDITCATD_GRADE, CURRENCY, OPEN_DATE, PERMITTED_OVERDRAFT, STATUS, INFO_DATE, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{creditcardNO}, #{creditcardName}, #{unit}, #{creditcardType}, #{creditcardGrade}, #{currency}, #{openDate}, #{permittedOverdraft}, #{status}, #{infoDate}, #{appId} )
